$:/plugins/breakzplatform/github-comment.text:
I'm trying to follow the rules of [[Semantic Versioning|https://semver.org/]].

!! 0.0.1

* First public release

! Frequently asked questions

!! Can I use on "read only" on wiki?

~GitHub is responsible for storing and managing comments, there is nothing to store in ~TiddlyWiki other than settings.

!! Will I be notified when a new comment is posted?

Every comment will be added to a issue on your ~GitHub repo. Learn more about [[GitHub notifications|https://docs.github.com/pt/account-and-profile/managing-subscriptions-and-notifications-on-github/setting-up-notifications/configuring-notifications]] to be notified when a new comment is added on a issue.

! ~GitHub comments

Use this plugin to give your visitors the opportunity to comment on your
tiddlers without changing the wiki itself. See the bottom of this tiddler for example.

* https://github.com/breakzplatform/tw5-github-comments (main repository, ''please add a star if you like the plugin'')

This plugin uses [[utterances|https://utteranc.es/]], a lightweight comments widget built on ~GitHub issues.

!! Installation instructions

To add the plugin to your own ~TiddlyWiki5, just drag this link to the browser window:

$:/plugins/breakzplatform/github-comments

For other installation options see the repo above.

//Select the next tab to continue.//

! Setup

Before you using the plugin, you need to configure [utterances|https://utteranc.es/] to work with your GitHub repository.

* Make sure the repo is public, otherwise your readers will not be able to view the issues/comments.
* Make sure the [utterances app|https://github.com/apps/utterances] is installed on the repo, otherwise users will not be able to post comments.
* If your repo is a fork, navigate to its settings tab and confirm the issues feature is turned on.
* Fill out the repo and website URL and add to the [[settings of the plugin|$:/plugins/breakzplatform/github-comments/settings/settings]] (next tab)
* Complete the setup and refresh your wiki
* Profit!

//Select the next tab to continue.//
